description: This file contains C source code implementing helper functions for message pack data processing, including memory allocation, unpacking, and data retrieval within a DVR (Digital Video Recorder) related project. The functions handle parsing message pack formatted data, locate specific keys, and convert data buffers into structured data, with logging for error handling.

methods.name: void * helper_convert(const void * buf,size_t len,size_t struct_size,const char * wrapper,msgpack_object_type expect_type,bool optional,process_fn_t process,destroy_fn_t destroy)
methods.description: Converts a buffer containing message pack data into a structured data format by unpacking, processing, with specific handling for parameterized data and optional elements.

methods.name: msgpack_object * __finder(const char * name,msgpack_object_type expect_type,msgpack_object_map * map)
methods.description: Internal helper function to locate a key with a specific name and type within a message pack map structure.

ctags.name: helper_convert
ctags.signature: (const void * buf,size_t len,size_t struct_size,const char * wrapper,msgpack_object_type expect_type,bool optional,process_fn_t process,destroy_fn_t destroy)
